meanings.definition: A person who is stupid or annoying.
meanings.sent1: Some dickheads always make loud noises in the library.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand those dickheads who never listen to anyone.
meanings.sent3: The group of dickheads at the party kept interrupting everyone's conversations.
meanings.sent4: The boss called the lazy employees dickheads for not completing their tasks.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the villain as a real dickhead, always causing trouble.

meanings.sent1: Don't be a dickhead and follow the rules.
meanings.sent2: He acted like a complete dickhead by ignoring everyone's advice.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the silly antics of dickheads in the audience.
meanings.sent4: She thought of her ex-boyfriend as a dickhead for cheating on her.
meanings.sent5: The character in the story was written as a lovable dickhead, always getting into trouble.
